Today, with decisive participation of Brazil, the historic agreement of Paris of # COP21
The Paris Agreement is fair, ambitious, balanced, long-lasting and legally binding # COP21
Brazil is proud to have worked for the Paris Agreement, as facilitator and builder of the solutions adopted # COP21
The Paris Agreement provides CDM + mechanism, joint proposal of Brazil and European Union that makes possible private investments. # COP21
The REDD + mechanism also provides for recognition and payment for results of actions to combat deforestation and forest degradation.
REDD + is fundamental for the implementation of Brazilian targets to combat climate change announced in September / 2015. # COP21
The Agreement provides for voluntary support among developing countries. Brazil can continue with South-South cooperation. # COP21
The Paris Agreement seeks to limit warming below 2ºC, with a concern to strengthen the goal up to 1,5ºC. # COP21
